title: skin doesn't work
body:
So,  I earned Badger Teemo skin on a chest box, today. So I went to try it, but the skin doesn't show up. 
it's not for sale, which means u can't buy it , cause it doesn't exist anymore....but the point is....if it doesn't exist, why do we keep receiving it if we cannot use it ? 
It's kinda unfair to earned something u cannot use... 

League of legends

replies.body:
Hey Sallyxruby02,

From what you've described, it sounds like you haven't upgraded the skin to a permanent yet. When you have a Skin Shard, you have 4 options:
1. **Re-roll** - Use 3 Skin Shards and Re-roll them into 1 random Skin Permanent.
2. **Disenchant** - Convert your Skin Shard into (Orange) Essence which you can use to Upgrade another Skin Shard.
3. **Activate** - Consume your Skin Shard and rent the skin for 7 days.
4. **Upgrade** - Consume your (Orange) Essence to convert your Skin Shard into a Skin Permanent.

If you receive a Skin Shard from a Hextech Chest that you really want, you'll need to Upgrade it into a Skin Permanent and redeem it onto your account. 

More information regarding how Hextech Crafting works can be found in our Knowledge Base article here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

If you believe you've already done this and still cannot use the Badger Teemo skin, please contact my colleagues through the Support Site so we can look into this further:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
